description: PM Modi visits Gurudwara in Tehran, Iran Prime Minister Narendra Modi today visited a Gurudwara in Tehran. Here are a few glimpses: First stop, for the community. PM @narendramodi arrives at the B
caption: nm-4.com
message:
My first programme in Tehran was a visit to the Bhai Ganga Singh Sabha Gurudwara. Spoke about the rich ethos of Sikhism & the spirit of Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam. 

We will celebrate 350th birth anniversary of Guru Gobind Singh ji on a large scale so that his message reverberates widely among youth. http://nm-4.com/igsp
